sentence: as you know, this occasion marks the thirtieth year of semiannual testimony on the economy and monetary policy by the federal reserve.

sentence: i take this opportunity to reiterate the federal reserve's strong support of the dual mandate; in pursuing maximum employment and price stability, monetary policy makes its greatest possible contribution to the general economic welfare.

sentence: let me now review the current economic situation and the outlook, beginning with developments in the real economy and the situation regarding inflation before turning to monetary policy.
